text: I want peace. I want to see if somewhere there isn't something left in life of charm and grace.
author: Margaret Mitchell

text: I know that if the peace movement takes its message boldly to the Negro people a powerful force can be secured in pursuit of the greatest goal of all mankind. And the same is true of labor and the great democratic sections of our population.
author: Paul Robeson

text: To solve the problem of organizing world peace we must establish world law and order.
author: Arthur Henderson

text: Let him who desires peace prepare for war.
author: Publius Flavius Vegetius Renatus

text: Most fear stems from sin to limit one's sins, one must assuredly limit one's fear, thereby bringing more peace to one's spirit.
author: Marvin Gaye
